channel.title: Deus Ex Human Revolution teaser trailer (it's awesome)
channel.description:
This trailer deserves its own thread.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4FRWYRqaGFE[/url]
I had the shivers watching that trailer. Now I hope the game is at least that good.

item.description:
It’s unfortunate that the game was delayed till… August I believe.
This is going to be that game that I play every waking minute of the year.
Like I did with Resident Evil 4 years ago.
Can’t wait!

item.title: Deus Ex Human Revolution teaser trailer (it's awesome)
item.dc:creator: Bingo_bango
item.description:
£40 for the pre-order on Steam, marked down from the £44.99 RRP? I call horseshit! Something tells me they’re expecting poor sales after post-release reviews and trying to milk the hype/nostalgia now. Like DA2 did! Fool me once…

EDIT: My mistake, that’s for the ‘uselessly bloated’ edition. Still … !

Read full topic

item.description:
Game is available for preorder! 2 new trailers about what they did to make the experience on the PC “true to the original DX.”

That’s all fine an good, but they had two art directors on, talking about game mechanics and control schemes. :hmph:

item.title: Deus Ex Human Revolution teaser trailer (it's awesome)
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I’m really bad at playing Deus Ex. I tried to spread out my skill points so I could level up a bunch of useful stats at the same time. Bad idea. I should have speced to only a couple, then branched out later. Fail. Hence, why I take twelve seconds to aim at someone’s head with a silenced pistol. ><

Read full topic

item.title: Deus Ex Human Revolution teaser trailer (it's awesome)
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
DethklokSoldier:

Or, like me, buy both the games and play them for the first time. Yeah, I never played them when they first came out. So sue me. People dog on me for not playing Starcraft also. Oh well. I’m only 17, still plenty of time to play all the games that people get pissed at me for not playing. Except WoW. Fuck that.

If you were 12 then that’d be reasonable, but 17 is no excuse!

item.title: Deus Ex Human Revolution teaser trailer (it's awesome)
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
The way I see it, I think it makes sense. Since the cinematics were always done in third-person anyway, I don’t think it hurts to see the takedowns in third-person either.

And you get to see the kick-ass animations in a better view.
